comment: 飲みやすくて美味しいし、安い

Bottle Opening/01/30/20
Store/Yamaya-Dougenzaka
Drink Style/Neat
15ml

1st:BlackCandy
2nd:BlackCandy strong,soil→sweet
3rd:little dry-fruit,prune,solty
[Tastes]
mouthfeels:light and sweet
main tastes: alcohol irritation,smoky
after tastes:very shot and sharp

Drink Style/Twice Up (evian)
[Nose]
1st:fruity and chocolate
2nd:sweet(heavy→light)
3rd:more chocolate

[Tastes]
overall light and sweet

Leeftijd

Smaak: 
Afdronk: middel

Not that bad, as I thought it was. Nose: smoke, cigarette smoke, a shade of sour dough (bad thing, definitely). Taste: pepper, smoke. Aftertaste: short, peppery.
        Update: two days after bottle was opened (hello, screw cap), smoke mostly disappeared, and shades of sun-dried fruits come on the foreground. No more "sour dough" smell. Taste and aftertaste remains the same. Total: 2.3/5 stars (68 score).

Can't touch and decent malt but it was only $15... good enough to mix though lol

None of that Lagavulin smoke
I'm not yet going to give tasting notes, but I will say that this is my favorite "inexpensive" scotch.
A bit sweet. Very cheap and good quality for this price
Sweet and with a little wood spice and a little smoke in a short finish. A bit thin and watery but you can't complain with the price. A serviceable everyday whisky to the budget strapped 😋
The Lagavulin at its heart comes through
Doesn't need any water, balance is nice. Has that smokey wood bite of scotch. Needs no ice, but is pretty bland. Nice for the price, but only a step or two above Kirkland.
A strong honey, a little bit of smoke
